languages.text: "Я устала от слепоты провидцев и ненависти собратьев, Шайрэнкхей. Все выборы нашего народа привели лишь к боли и гибели тех, кого мы любили. Я более не желаю становиться частью чужой ненависти и платить за ошибки тех, кто должен был вести нас к свету, а привел к забвению". {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт впивается в стоящих неподалеку провидцев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [драфт]Если активен каунтер Пути Проклятия, Ирлиэт. наконец, признает, как же ее задолбали все эти разборки, глупость провидцев и ненависть собратьев. Согласится с тем, что мир-корабль должен забрать эльдар с крудараха из Коронуса и отвезди их как можно дальше — чтобы ее глаза их не видели.
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я устала от слепоты провидцев и ненависти собратьев, Шайрэнкхей. Все выборы нашего народа привели лишь к боли и гибели тех, кого мы любили. Я более не желаю становиться частью чужой ненависти и платить за ошибки тех, кто должен был вести нас к свету, а привел к забвению". {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт впивается в стоящих неподалеку провидцев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am tired of the seers' blindness and my kinsmen's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to somebody else's hatred and pay for the mistakes of the ones who were supposed to guide us toward the light but led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby seers.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Estoy harta de la ceguera de los videntes y del rencor de mis congéneres, Shairenkhei. Nuestras decisiones no nos han granjeado más que sufrimiento y la pérdida de nuestros seres queridos. Ya no deseo ser cómplice del odio de otros ni pagar por los errores de quienes debían guiarnos hacia la luz y en vez de eso nos han sumido en tinieblas». {n}Yrliet mira fijamente a los videntes congregados.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estoy harta de la ceguera de los videntes y del rencor de mis congéneres, Shairenkhei. Nuestras decisiones no nos han granjeado más que sufrimiento y la pérdida de nuestros seres queridos. Ya no deseo ser cómplice del odio de otros ni pagar por los errores de quienes debían guiarnos hacia la luz y en vez de eso nos han sumido en tinieblas». {n}Yrliet mira fijamente a los videntes congregados.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我厌倦了先知们的盲目，厌倦了同胞的仇恨，榭伦凯。我们族人做出的所有选择，只会带来痛苦，让我们的亲人丧命。我不想再成为别人仇恨的帮凶。那些本该指引我们走向光明的人，却带领我们走向了湮灭。我不想再为他们的错误负责了。”{n}伊莉耶特怒视着身边的几位先知。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我厌倦了先知们的盲目，和我们同胞的仇恨，榭伦凯。我们族人做出的所有选择，只会带来痛苦，让我们的亲人丧命。我不想再成为别人仇恨的帮凶。那些本该指引我们走向光明的人，却带领我们走向了湮灭。我不想再为他们的错误负责了。”{n}伊莉耶特怒视着身边的几位先知。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'en ai assez de l'aveuglement des Grands Prophètes et de la haine de mes semblables, Shairenkhei. Nos choix n'ont entraîné que la souffrance et la mort de ceux que nous aimons. Je ne veux plus être complice de la haine d'un autre, ni payer pour les erreurs de ceux qui nous ont menés à notre perte au lieu de nous guider vers la lumière, » {n}dit Yrliet en lançant un regard noir aux Grands Prophètes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai assez de l'aveuglement des prophètes et de la haine de mes semblables, Shairenkhei. Nos choix n'ont entraîné que la souffrance et la mort de ceux que nous aimons. Je ne veux plus être complice de la haine d'un autre, ni payer pour les erreurs de ceux qui nous ont menés à notre perte au lieu de nous guider vers la lumière, » {n}dit Yrliet en lançant un regard noir aux prophètes.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私は先見司たちの盲目と血族たちの憎悪にうんざりしているんだ、シャイレンケイ。我々の民の選択はすべて、苦しみと愛する者の喪失をもたらしただけだった。私はもう、誰かの憎悪の共犯者になりたくないし、我々を光へと導くはずだった者たちが犯した過ちの代償を払いたくもない」{n}ユリエットは近くの先見司たちを睨みつける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私は先見司たちの盲目と血族たちの憎悪にうんざりしているんだ、シャイレンケイ。我々の民の選択はすべて、苦しみと愛する者の喪失をもたらしただけだった。私はもう、誰かの憎悪の共犯者になりたくないし、我々を光へと導くはずだった者たちが犯した過ちの代償を払いたくもない」{n}ユリエットは近くの先見司たちを睨みつける。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin die Blindheit der Runenpropheten und den Hass meiner Verwandten leid, Shairenkhei. Alle Entscheidungen unseres Volkes haben nur zu Leid und zum Verlust unserer Familien geführt. Ich will nicht länger Komplizin für den Hass anderer sein und für die Fehler derer bezahlen, die uns ins Licht führen sollten, uns stattdessen aber ins Nichts geschickt haben." {n}Yrliet blickt die Runenpropheten in der Nähe zornig an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin die Blindheit der Seher und den Hass meiner Verwandten leid, Shairenkhei. Alle Entscheidungen unseres Volkes haben nur zu Leid und zum Verlust unserer Familien geführt. Ich will nicht länger Komplizin für den Hass anderer sein und für die Fehler derer bezahlen, die uns ins Licht führen sollten, uns stattdessen aber ins Nichts geschickt haben." {n}Yrliet blickt die Seher in der Nähe zornig an.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ötesezenlerin körlüklerinden de soydaşlarımın nefretinden de bıktım Shairenkhei. Halkımızın yaptığı tüm o seçimler, yalnızca acıya ve sevdiklerimizi kaybetmemize yol açtı. Artık ne başka birinin öfkesine ortak olmak ne de bizi ışığa yönlendirmesi gerekirken felakete sürükleyenlerin hatalarının bedelini ödemek istiyorum." {n}Yrliet, etraftaki Ötesezenlere bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am tired of the Farseers' blindness and my kin's hatred, Shairenkhei. All of the choices of our people led only to suffering and the loss of our loved ones. I no longer wish to be an accomplice to another's hatred and pay for the mistakes of those who were supposed to guide us toward the light but who led us into oblivion." {n}Yrliet glares at the nearby Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ötesezenlerin körlüklerinden de soydaşlarımın nefretinden de bıktım Shairenkhei. Halkımızın yaptığı tüm o seçimler, yalnızca acılara ve sevdiklerimizi kaybetmemize yol açtı. Artık ne başka birinin öfkesine ortak olmak ne de bizi ışığa yönlendirmesi gerekirken felakete sürükleyenlerin hatalarının bedelini ödemek istiyorum." {n}Yrliet, etraftaki Ötesezenlere bakış atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
